name: Mynerva's Isle
description:
Mynerva's Isle is a meta-RPG Maker game with an early Gameboy-inspired art style.

CREATED INDEPENDENTLY BY HYPOGRIFFH

A cargo trip in the Eternal Sea goes up in flames when a mysterious serpent attacks! The young First Mate makes it onto the island safely, but what about his crew? What about his captain?

Explore the island and discover the truth!

I'm sure nothing-- and noONE will want to hinder your progress.

MYNERVA'S ISLE FEATURES FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT (tested on XBOX and DUALSHOCK controllers).

Arrow keys / left analog stick - Move

Z / bottom face button - Interact

X / right face button - Cancel

Left Shift / left face button - Run

C / top face button - Menu

  • Explore the Isle, finding and using items to unlock new areas.
  • Explore your own computer for clues and objectives.
  • Don't forget to save.
  • And most importantly...
